issuetype.name: Story

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

fields.summary: rolling updates sometimes does not succeed immediately if signals are received

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: As a cloudformation user, I would like to be able to run 'Update Stack' with resources removed from the updated stack.  Rollback is not part of this story.
fields.summary: CF: simple 'positive' update case with deleting resources

comments.body: Relates to EUCA-12287 due to the fact that the template used in the {{UpdateStack}} call replaces the {{AWS::AutoScaling::LaunchConfiguration}} resource.

*Eucalyptus Version*

{{4.3.0-0.25026.354.20160712git783d0ca.el7}}

*Steps*

# Create stack using linked {{cfn-as-create-update-policies-test-min.json}} template:
{code}
[root@c-34 ~]# euform-create-stack UpdatePolicyTest --template-file cfn-as-create-update-policies-test-min.json --parameter ImageId=emi-390608b5 --parameter EndPoint=http://cloudformation.c-13.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ --parameter MinSize=2 --parameter MaxSize=4 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region testrunner-admin@
arn:aws:cloudformation::000341583960:stack/UpdatePolicyTest/6b76cd83-fe8e-46b6-8eeb-8d7aaca64c6e
[root@c-34 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region testrunner-admin@
STACK	UpdatePolicyTest	CREATE_IN_PROGRESS	User Initiated	AutoScaling Create and Update Policy Test - MVP for CreationPolicy and UpdatePolicy with Resource Signals (Ubuntu 16.04 or Greater)	2016-07-18T20:18:57.655Z
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-390608b5
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.medium
PARAMETER	EndPoint		http://cloudformation.c-13.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
PARAMETER	MinSize		2
PARAMETER	MaxSize		4
...
[root@c-34 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region testrunner-admin@
STACK	UpdatePolicyTest	CREATE_COMPLETE		AutoScaling Create and Update Policy Test - MVP for CreationPolicy and UpdatePolicy with Resource Signals (Ubuntu 16.04 or Greater)	2016-07-18T20:18:57.655Z
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-390608b5
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.medium
PARAMETER	EndPoint		http://cloudformation.c-13.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
PARAMETER	MinSize		2
PARAMETER	MaxSize		4
OUTPUT	AutoScalingGroup	UpdatePolicyTest-AutoScalingGroup-ZXZ5HICKOW8JX
{code}
# Confirm instance resources:
{code}
[root@c-34 ~]# euca-describe-instances --region testrunner-admin@

TAG	instance	i-1d5296bc	aws:cloudformation:stack-name	UpdatePolicyTest
{code}
# {{UpdateStack}} using linked {{cfn-as-create-update-policies-update-launchconfig.json}} template.
{code}

arn:aws:cloudformation::000341583960:stack/UpdatePolicyTest/6b76cd83-fe8e-46b6-8eeb-8d7aaca64c6e
{code}
# Confirm stack is in {{UPDATE_IN_PROGRESS}} state then cancel the update:
{code}
[root@c-34 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region testrunner-admin@
